message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product to you is significant.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit lower on the budget. How about we try $11,000?
